profile:
Our Mission

As professionally trained arborists we provide the highest quality tree surgery to communities in Northumberland, Trent Hills and Durham Region.

Our goal is holistic tree care. We prefer to use environmental or natural options to breathe life and vigor back into your tree, so we do not offer pesticide spraying. With a variety of specialized services, from simple pruning to synthetic stabilizing cables, we can assess and give your trees the best care possible. 

Why Trust Your Property To Us?

We have the knowledge base, hands on experience and the enthusiasm to tackle any problem. Starting with health assessments, we diagnose the disease or the environmental problem, then execute our risk management plan, and provide you with the knowledge for continual care of your trees or forest.
